column5: Hi y'all,  i've skunked the last 3 times out....so decided to go to Thunder lake just to break the run of bad luck, as it has produced lakers consistently. Turned into a party of 3 and we hit the Lake by 10:30 am.  Not before Lew got his truck buried in the ditch, lol....made a nice change to pull someone out...its usaully the other way round.....i was very proud of my little Canyon yanking that big Dodge Ram out!!!   Anyway, we set up in the same spot i had fished all ice season so far, and not long after setting up Lew iced a small one...and threw it back. I then got 2 nice ones in quick succession, both getting off right at the hole....DOH!!!!   After that we missed a couple bites...but it gradually got quieter...until there was no action at all really. We would have moved but tie was an issue as i was on-call for night shift.   Anyway....we did see some small stuff hugging the bottom in 55' FOW, i managed to hook into one...pulled it up...and there it was...a WALLEYE! ok...this lake has a lot o f nice walleye, but i tried in vain all summer to get one in this lake, then when i'm trying for trout to break the skunk...lol...i do it with my 1st Thunder Lake Walleye...sweet....not the best fishing action...but mission accomplished!      FOR ONCE IT AINT ME IN A DITCH OR BURIED TO THE BELLY IN A BEACH!           CHASED A SKUNK AWAY WITH MY 1ST THUNDER LAKE WALLEYE!
glad you got the skunk smell off ya!  looks like a nice size walleye too  cheers!
good to see your luck is on the up-swing.  really nice ,clean wally you iced.  welldone
YES!!!  So long, skunky-pants...hello walleye dinner!  Very well done...now I KNOW I'll catch some fish this weekend
'Skunky pants"....too funny.    Unfortunately i will not be fishing this weekend....i'll be at work....being very productive chasing bugs off the screen like someone else i know
If you can catch all those fish, why can't you catch that damn fly on your posts, it drives me nuts LOL

A Dadge wouldn't pull a sick ho off of a pee pot!!!  Good on you for brealing the skunk streak with that real pretty Wall-ice!!!  Now go catch some more Ling, so I can look at the pics and vids!!!  Thanks for posting that good report!!!

Good on you for getting that skunk off of your shoulder    starting to smell a lot better round here Congratulation for catching your 1st Thunder Lake Walleye     Real beauty!!  and thanks for sharing Jacques
thats a beauty eye ya got there simon, good work.  Matt!
Nice walleye simon glad to see ya got rid of the bad smell of skunk !!!!....nice pic too ...cheers
See!  That white stripe washes off real easy. Glad you broke the streak.
BIG minnow or little minnow?....were ya still fishin for lakers???
Congrats on your first one. Maybe it will be the start of many more to come this year and in the future!
Big Fat dace minnow for trout...was using the same big white long shank jig i was using when we went to vickers those 2 times.
Nice...was tryin that today hopin' for a walter......didn't have much confidence. No walters.
